import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Post from "../components/post"; import axios from 'axios'; export default function PostList() { const [posts, setPosts] = useState([]); const fetchPosts = async() => { await axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/posts') } useEffect(()=>{ fetchPosts(); }) return <>

Latest Posts

{ posts.map((post)=> ) }
